name: Adrift (Dabby Media)
description:
Every time you've lost a life playing Asteroids, you've left an astronaut stranded in space. Get out there and bring them home.

The demo version includes 4 sectors. The final release will contain at least 10 sectors.

FEATURES
- Retro-Style Graphics
- Minimalist Arcade-Inspired Gameplay
- Precision Controls
- Time-based Scoring

CREDITS
Graphics by DyLESTorm, Deep-Fold & CodeManu
Sound Effects by Kronbits & Dabby Media
Soundtrack by Dabby Media
Made with Fusion 2.5
